attributes.action: Make Unlicensed, Semi-Pro and White Collar Boxing illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Unlicensed Boxing under any label is unsafe and it is damaging the sport of boxing in the UK.

I would like to put forward this petition as I want the UK government to make boxing without either an amateur or professional licence completely illegal.

This will ensure the safety of competitors and the image of UK sport continues to develop in the way it should.
